title: [1.7.10][ssp/smp][已授权]HoloInventory - 物品清单[InfStudio]
author: mcjava
txt_content:
本帖最后由 mcjava 于 2015-8-8 23:19 编辑 

  授权




QQ截图20150808221106.png (73.95 KB, 下载次数: 108)

下载附件

2015-8-8 22:41 上传






 介绍 
这个mod增加了一个物品清单显示。你不能与它进行交互，它只是给你看的！
只要你把准星对准容器(箱子、漏斗等)，这个物品清单将会显示出来。
背景颜色是可以选择的，可以通过修改配置文件修改。
在服务器上使用，服务器必须安装此Mod。
准星对准村民，将会显示村民交易的东西和价格。

   下载地址PS：由于原作者不允许二次上传，这里给出的是作者原地址：
 1.7.10 - CurseForge


  更新日志
 v1.9 Double chests are now finally considered 1 inventory.
? v1.8.3 Added code for StorageDrawers and fixed byte overflow
? Update to 1.7.10, removed capes & added something more unique 
? v1.8.2: Added config option to disable item rotation on fancy graphics.
? v1.8.1: Added inventory name overriding. (See command help.)
? v1.8.0: MC 1.7.2 update + added entity disable in config
? v1.7.0: Added cycle mode
? v1.6.5: Added different modes such as "Sorted" and "most abundant"
? v1.6.3: Fixed error in log with capes
? v1.6.2: Fixed issue with command in SSP
? v1.6.1: Fixed issue #2 (NPE with inv name) + Improved sync for servers
? v1.6.0: Fixed server syncing (now works properly with +1 person on SMP)
? v1.5.4: Inventory names
? v1.5.1: Fixed rendering on fast graphics.
? v1.5: Villagers?!
? v1.4.1: Added:
- Stacking (2 stacks of same block will combine, config)
- Dynamic scaling (Bigger inventories have smaller icons)
? v1.4: Added banning of types of blocks and entitys. Use this to block lets say personal safes.
? v1.3: Added keybinding. See the config file for options. Basic you can now control when it renders with keys.
? v1.2: Added support for entitys. (minecarts and such)
? v1.1: Added update checker, disableable in the config.
? You can now toggle the rendering of the text and the multiple items per stack to indicate stack size. (Toggleable separately).
? JukeBoxes?!
? Enderchests?!
? Non stackable items don't render the stacksize.


   备注此Mod对有些Mod中的容器不支持目前未发现有Mod与此Mod冲突
